title: McCaul on BIS Decision to Change Terminology, Dodge Statutory Responsibility
summary: Washington, D.C. – House Foreign Affairs Committee Lead Republican Michael McCaul released the following statement in response to the Commerce Department’s Bureau of Industry’s (BIS) decision…

title: McCaul Discusses China and Taiwan at World Economic Forum
summary: Washington, D.C. – Today, House Foreign Affairs Committee Lead Republican Michael McCaul participated in a panel at the World Economic Forum entitled, “Cold War 2.0.”
